original_text: From the clan of Bani: Meshullam, Malluch, Adaiah, Jashub, Sheal, Jeremoth. From the clan of Bani: Meshullam, Malluch, Adaiah, Jashub, Sheal, Jeremoth. From the clan of Bani:
korean_text: 바니 자손 중에서는 므술람과 말룩과 아다야와 야숩과 스알과 여레못이요

sentences.original_text: Meshullam, Malluch, Adaiah, Jashub, Sheal, Jeremoth.
sentences.korean_translation: 메술람, 말룩, 아다야, 야숩, 스알, 여레못.

sentences.original_text: Meshullam, Malluch, Adaiah, Jashub, Sheal, Jeremoth.
sentences.korean_translation: 메술람, 말룩, 아다야, 야숩, 스알, 여레못.
